Class cachecontentgroup

java.lang.Object
  com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.base.base_resource
      com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.config.cache.cachecontentgroup

public class cachecontentgroup
extends base_resource

Configuration for Integrated Cache content group resource.
